img.p: KRISTIN FARREY – GHS IAEA TRAVELING ART SHOW WINNER

img.alt: GMS Spelling Bee Winners: 2nd Place - Liliana Asta 3rd Place - Kenzie Brown NOT PICTURED: Sami Ouahbi -1st Place
img.p:
GMS Spelling Bee Winners:
2nd Place – Liliana Asta
3rd Place – Kenzie Brown
NOT PICTURED: Sami Ouahbi -1st Place

div.p: Table of Contents: Rationale 2 Communication to Families 2 Staff Expectations 3 Teachers ...

h2.a: 3.19.20 Letter to Parents staff and community

div.p: March 20, 2020 Dear Galena parents, students, staff, and community members, This letter is to provide an update since last Friday on the details being worked on to continue the “continuity of edu...

Due to the Shelter in Place order, the March 24th Regular Meeting has been cancelled. It will be rescheduled for April 8th. Due to the Shelter in Place order, the March 24th Regular Board Meeting h...
